Kartik Aaryan Dances With His Mom On Sonu Ke Titu Ki Sweety Song ‘Dil Chori’ & Their Love Is Warming Our Hearts
Kartik Aaryan Dances With His Mom On Sonu Ke Titu Ki Sweety Song ‘Dil Chori’ & Their Love Is Warming Our Hearts
‘Dil Chori Sada Ho Gaya’ Tha long back, when Kartik Aryan had made debut in Bollywood with sleeper hit Pyaar Ka Punchnama. He once said that he thought girls would hate him after his five-minute-long monologue in the movie, but they were rather crushing on him and how. This man makes us go weak in our knees, doesn’t he?
Twitter
After Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2, he once again made waves with Sonu Ke Titu Ki Sweety, an unexpected blockbuster family entertainer film that struck the right chord with the audiences. Post this movie, he became an overnight sensation!
cinestaan.com
He will next be seen in Lukka Chuppi alongside Kriti Sanon. Katrik Aryan, who is busy with the promotions of the movie, recently celebrated one year anniversary of the surprise blockbuster movie. He shared a throwback video of his mother dancing along with him on Dil Chori, and it was simply adorable. Check it out.
